specialtySkill.description: The dignified do not show signs of panic.

summonQuote: Experience the power of Malicus, the Lord of Fire.
description: A weird cook of the Wild Dog Company who became normal

name: Blood Blade Karin
background: Karin is embroiled in an endless battle against the will of a cursed magical sword, compelled by its power to cause trouble. Though aggressive and cold-hearted while possessed by the sword, she sometimes escapes from the control of it and shows an unexpected side.

skills.name: Sequential Cutter
skills.description: Quickly strikes the enemy with a sword, absorbing Health proportional to damage dealt. Caster's Combat Readiness increases by 50% if the enemy is defeated.

skills.name: Cursed Sword
skills.description: As Health decreases, Attack, Defense, and Speed increase.

skills.name: Blade Art: Dragon
skills.description: Attacks all enemies, sacrificing 20% of the caster's Health. Grants the caster an extra turn when an enemy is defeated.

specialtySkill.name: Blood Chaser
specialtySkill.description: The smell of blood travels far. She'll track the victim in no time.

summonQuote: I will show you the power of the enchanted blade.
description: The wielder of a magical blade thirsty for blood

name: Cartuja
background: In Farche, the nomadic Tuharta Clan is wiped out by a great sandstorm. Cartuja leads the few survivors as they wander in search of a new home, working day and night as a mercenary to raise enough money to save his clan.

skills.name: Shred
skills.description: Attacks with sharp claws, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Danger Zone
skills.description: When attacked, increases Combat Readiness by 10%. Increases Combat Readiness by an additional 10% if the caster's Health is less than 50%.

skills.name: Predatory Roar
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with wild energy, healing the caster by 50% of max Health before granting increased Defense for 2 turns, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack of the enemy for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health, with additional damage increase when the caster has less than 50% Health.

specialtySkill.name: Explorer
specialtySkill.description: Their curiosity for the new world is second to none.

summonQuote: I feel like we'll be good friends.
description: Courageous and valiant, the greatest warrior in Farche

name: Celestial Mercedes
background: A mysterious being from the stars, nobody knows where Celestial Mercedes came from, or what she has gone through. She freely duplicates any Human or thing she pleases, and currently resides in the Farche Frontier in a cloned body of Mercedes.

skills.name: Divine Bolt
skills.description: Attacks with shock magic, with a 30% chance to make the enemy unhealable for 2 turns.

skills.name: Dimensional Rupture
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a massive light sphere, dealing damage proportional to the enemy's max Health.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Finale
skills.description: Attacks all enemies by releasing spells of The Last Spellbook. Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns and increases Combat Readiness by 20% according to the number of critical hits made.

specialtySkill.name: Good and Evil
specialtySkill.description: There's a fine line between good and evil.

summonQuote: Were you looking for me? Tell me what you want me to do.
description: Otherworldly creature, hiding her truth

name: Challenger Dominiel
background: Fiercely proud and unreserved, Challenger Dominiel has little morality or sense of empathy. While constantly causing trouble, she refuses to admit her faults.

skills.name: Electrocute
skills.description: Attacks with electricity. A critical hit will increase damage dealt.

skills.name: Electric Charge
skills.description: When an ally makes a critical hit, the caster's next attack deals stacked additional damage proportional to the number of critical hits and their Combat Readiness increases by 10% per critical hit.

skills.name: Supercharge
skills.description: Releases powerful electricity, increasing Critical Hit Rate of all allies for 3 turns, and Combat Readiness by 10%. The caster is also granted an extra turn.

specialtySkill.name: Echo
specialtySkill.description: Dreams about her voice ringing out across continents.

summonQuote: Look at me! The successor of the Nixied Clan!
description: The confident successor of Nixied

name: Champion Zerato
background: Incredibly skilled in fighting, Champion Zerato boasts a flawless win streak, largely thanks to his refusal to fight anyone he may be at risk of losing to. Frost Mage Zerato has been trying to pick a fight with him for a long time, but Champion Zerato keeps making excuses to avoid it.

skills.name: Earthen Rage
skills.description: Attacks two enemies including the target with an earthen blast, transferring two debuffs from the caster to the enemy and recovering the caster's Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Iron Will
skills.description: Immune to stun, sleep, and Decrease Hit Chance. Has a 80% chance to counterattack when attacked while debuffed.

skills.name: Cataclysm
skills.description: Attacks all enemies by slamming rocks, with a 60% chance each to decrease Defense and Attack for 2 turns. Increases Defense of the caster for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Victory Streak
specialtySkill.description: He does not want to break his winning streak.

summonQuote: If you want to know what a genius looks like, eat your heart out.
description: An arrogant and impudent supremacist who only cares about strength

name: Cidd
background: Cidd is the youngest member and mascot of the Wild Dog Company, a group of mercenaries headquartered in an old ruined fortress in Wetheric Moor. Contrary to his cheerful and carefree appearance, he will competently complete any task assigned to him. He cares for the Wild Dog Company as if they were family.

skills.name: Relentless Strike
skills.description: Attacks with a dagger. A critical hit will increase speed of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's speed

skills.name: Wind's Resolve
skills.description: Enhances Relentless Strike, increasing Damage dealt, when the caster is granted increased speed, and decreases defense of the enemy for 1 turn.

skills.name: Hack
skills.description: Cuts with a dagger, granting an extra turn if they enemy is defeated. Attacks using an adventageous element when the caster is granted increased Speed. Damage dealt increases proportional to caster's speed.

specialtySkill.name: Animal Instinct
specialtySkill.description: Oustanding senses of smell and hearing are very helpful when hunting.

summonQuote: Badabum! I have arrived! Cidd is here! What do you want me to do?
description: The Wild Dog Company mascot, a wild hound as fast as the wind

name: Clarissa
background: A young nun of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, Clarissa's purity made her a mascot of the church. However, as soon as she set out on her pilgrimage, her true fighting nature began to reveal itself.

skills.name: Harsh Lesson
skills.description: Attacks with a morning star, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

skills.name: Rage
skills.description: Becomes enraged for 3 turns when an enemy is killed by Harsh Lesson or Hysteric, and grants an extra AoE attack on all enemies.

skills.name: Hysteric
skills.description: Attacks all enemies by spinning, inflicting bleeding for 2 turns. When the caster is enraged, damage dealt is increased and an additional bleeding effect can be stacked.

specialtySkill.name: Enforcer
specialtySkill.description: When she's pursuing criminals, she doesn't even sleep.

summonQuote: To follow the path once tread by the Goddess is my calling.
description: A nun with a violent split personality

name: Coli
background: Born in a village, Coli was made a refugee by the Archdemon War. She joined a band of vigilantes in order to help protect her family and has a talent for stealing items from thieves when she attacks them.

skills.name: Ambush
skills.description: Ambushes the enemy, activating Ambush again if stealthed. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Accurate Strike
skills.description: Attacks with an unseen blade, decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%, before granting a barrier and stealth for 1 turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to caster's Attack, and damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Baptism of Fire
skills.description: Attacks with a dagger and bomb, decreasing Combat Readiness by 25% three times, stunning the target for 1 turn and granting the caster stealth for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

specialtySkill.name: Life of Frugality
specialtySkill.description: Has always dreamed of using her savings to build a new village for everyone.

summonQuote: Will you call me Coli? Run with me, to the edge of the world!
description: A cheerful vigilante burdened with the horrors of war

name: Corvus
background: A priest of the Rose Apostles, Corvus is famous in Farche for leading the Young Sheep of the Eternal Mother missionaries.

skills.name: Shield Slam
skills.description: Shoves the enemy with a shield, with a 50% chance to transfer one debuff from the caster to the enemy. When the caster is enraged, damage dealt is increased and the enemy is stunned for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Macerate
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with an iron mace, decreasing Combat Readiness by 20%. When the enemy's Combat Readiness is 0, stuns for 1 turn. When the caster is enraged, doubles the amount of Combat Readiness decrease. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Amount of Health recovered is doubled.
skills.name: Fury's Advent
skills.description:
The caster becomes enraged with Fighting Spirit for 3 turns, recovering Health, before granting an extra turn.
Begins the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit.
Gains 10 Fighting Spirit when attacked.

specialtySkill.name: The Good Shepherd
specialtySkill.description: Helps wanderers with sincerity and passion.

summonQuote: The innocent will always be saved, you damned fools!
description: A wild-blooded missionary, a veteran of bottomless faith

name: Crescent Moon Rin
background: A dancer at the Crescent Moon Theatre in Savara loved by many for her outstanding beauty, talent, and the mystery that surrounds her true identity. Only a few, including her guardian, Basar, know she is Rin.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Grants a random buff to all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Heckle
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a ring, granting a random buff to the caster for 1 turn.

skills.name: Eyecatcher
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a lavish dance, stealing two buffs and granting their effects to all allies.

skills.name: Curtain Call
skills.description: Crosses rings to attack the enemy, dispelling all of the target's buffs before granting immunity to all allies for 2 turns. Caster is granted an extra turn if the target's buffs have been dispelled.

specialtySkill.name: Alluring Look
specialtySkill.description: Once you fall for these eyes, there's no escaping.

summonQuote: Did I leave you waiting too long?
description: A dancing girl beloved by everyone for her mysterious charm

name: Crimson Armin
background: A destructive super cute mercenary, the nickname of Super Cute Guardian of the Red Flame fits Armin perfectly. She assures that she will defend fiercely, indifferent of what she destroys while doing so.

skills.name: Takedown
skills.description: Attacks with a large shield, with a 50% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Security State
skills.description: Decreases damage received by allies from a critical hit by 10%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Shield of Holy Spirit
skills.description: Covers all allies with an aura of holy spirit, granting immunity for 2 turns and invincibility for 1 turn.

specialtySkill.name: Cuteness Wins
specialtySkill.description: Being cute always wins, right?

summonQuote: Hi hi! Did you miss me?
description: The bright and bubbly self-proclaimed Super Cute Guardian of the Red Flame

name: Crozet
background: Knight Commander of the Order of the Shield, Crozet places a strict emphasis on following the rules, and is notoriously inflexible on them. His excessive uprightness means he often does not realize when others are playing tricks on him.

skills.name: Rush
skills.description: Attacks with a sword, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Mark of Protection
skills.description: Grants increased Defense and a barrier to an ally for 2 turns when an attack causes their Health to fall below 50%. Barrier strength increases proportional to the target's max Health. Can be activated once every turn.

skills.name: Breakthrough
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn after decreasing their Combat Readiness by 35%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

specialtySkill.name: Fine Dining
specialtySkill.description: You might need a specialty or two to lead the Order of the Shield.

summonQuote: I will do my best.
description: Honest and incorruptible, the Knight Commander of the Order of the Shield

name: Dingo
background: A genius holding the power of inferno in his hands after swearing a compact with Malicus, the Lord of Fire, Dingo became a chef to make full use of his abilities. He sees all living creatures as potential ingredients.

skills.name: Prep Ingredients
skills.description: Cuts the enemy with a cleaver, with a 40% chance to inflict bleeding for 2 turns. After attack, there's a 30% chance to activate Quick Grill.

skills.name: Quick Grill
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with the Glove Oven. If the enemy is bleeding, there is a 75% chance to burn for 2 turns.

skills.name: Free Dinner
skills.description: Provides allies with a meal, dispelling all debuffs and decreasing cooldown by 1 turn. Grants the caster an extra turn. Every time the enemy dies, the cooldown for this skill decreases by 1 turn.

specialtySkill.name: Delicacy
specialtySkill.description: Dingo's dishes are so good they'll make you hallucinate. A real chef's chef.

summonQuote: Him, I'd love to cook him once.
description: The master chef obsessed with ingredients over all else

name: Dominiel
background: Successor of a clan that has long served the Spirit Lord Nixied. After incredible effort she finally succeeded in harnessing Nixied's power, but still lacks confidence in her abilities.

skills.name: Hail
skills.description: Throws ice fragments at the enemy, with a 35% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Blizzard Cape
skills.description: Casts reflect and a barrier on all allies for 2 turns with frost magic. Barrier strength increases in proportion to the caster's Attack.

skills.name: Ice Spear
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a large block of ice, with a 75% chance to stun for 1 turn and a 35% chance to decrease Combat Readiness by 30%.

specialtySkill.name: Touch of Winter
specialtySkill.description: Blessed with the power of Nixied, the Lord of Winter. She's the successor of a Soul Weaver clan that worships him.

summonQuote: I am Dominiel Nixied, successor to the Nixied Clan.
description: Hard-working mage blessed by the Spirit Lord Nixied

name: Fighter Maya
background: The second magic doll to be created in Reingar, modeled on Maya with incredible combat skills and a belligerent attitude. She is the type to learn and grow from her experiences, but having been created only a short time ago, she tends to be childish and overly honest about her feelings. She is fond of her sparring partner, Zerato.

skills.name: Strike of Provocation
skills.description: Attacks with a blunt weapon, with a 50% chance to provoke for 1 turn.

skills.name: Reclaim
skills.description: Has a 80% chance to dispel one debuff and be granted increased Defense for 2 turns when attacked.

skills.name: Finishing Attack
skills.description: Attacks with a powerful smash.  Damage dealt increases by 300% if the enemy's Health is less than 30%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

specialtySkill.name: Righteous Stare
specialtySkill.description: Bravely faces any hardship head-on

summonQuote: I know I can fight better than anyone!
description: A magic doll of Reingar created for battles

name: Furious
background: A man of principle, Furious believes that a leader should serve the community, not individuals. He believes that the citylord is an important cog in the machine that is Aakhen.

skills.name: Quickdraw
skills.description: Fires a gun while dashing towards the enemy, with a 20% chance to burn for 2 turns.

skills.name: Morale Boost
skills.description: Raises morale of all allies, granting increased Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns, before granting an extra turn to the caster.

skills.name: Fatal Bullet
skills.description: Attacks with a fatal shot, with a 80% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Cold-Hearted Veredict
specialtySkill.description: Unmoved by emotions, he makes his decisions with firm conviction.

name: General Purrgis
background: Daring and responsible, General Purrgis will never abandon his subordinates in a dangerous situation, and commands all of their respect.

skills.name: Heroic Strike
skills.description: Mows down enemies with a great sword, with a 50% chance to provoke for 1 turn.

skills.name: Spearhead
skills.description: Increases all allies' Combat Readiness by 10% when the caster is attacked.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Command to Charge
skills.description: Gives the command to charge, dealing damage to all enemies, with a 75% chance of stunning two random enemies for 1 turn. Increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Regular Customer
specialtySkill.description: Spend a lot of time hanging around the lobby thinking about his next task.

summonQuote: It is a general's duty to lead his people along the right path.
description: A cool-headed general commanding the respect of all

name: Guider Aither
background: An ever-cheerful traveler, Aither loves life on the road. As he embarks on a journey to find his lost memories, he is often followed by small animals.

skills.name: Whispering Spirit
skills.description: Attacks with spirit power, with a 25% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Spirit's Protection
skills.description: Attacks with spirit power, and grants caster a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Attack.

skills.name: Wave of Force
skills.description: Delivers a blow to the enemy with the Energy of Souls, recovering Health of all allies. All allies are granted continuous healing for 2 turns. Amount healed increased proportional to damage dealt.

specialtySkill.name: Innocent Wanderer
specialtySkill.description: Neither wind nor rain can stop him.

summonQuote: Hi! Will you introduce yourself? Will you play with me?
description: A free and nimble little bird that has lost its memories

ex_equip.name: Whispered Faith
ex_equip.description: A mystical whistle that enables the user to freely exchange feelings with small creatures.

enhancements.description: Spirit Protection's barrier cover all allies.
Stuns the enemy for 1 turn when using Wave of Force.
Increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns when using Wave of Force.

name: Karin
background: Second Lieutenant in the Public Security Club of Reingar, Karin struggles to maintain order in the Magical Academy, a place brimming with dangerous creativity. Many call her the conscience and the real big boss of the Public Security Club.

skills.name: Sequential Cutter
skills.description: Strikes the enemy with a sword. A critical hit will decrease cooldown for 1 turn.

skills.name: Blade Art: Flash
skills.description: Slashes the enemy. A critical hit will decrease Defense for 1 turn and grant an extra turn.

skills.name: Blade Art: Thunder
skills.description: Cuts the enemy with lightning speed. A critical hit will increase Damage.

specialtySkill.name: Protector of Order
specialtySkill.description: As justice is the root of all order, she performs one heroic exploit after another.

summonQuote: Protector of justice, truth, magic and! Uh, what comes after that? In any case, Lieutenant Karin has arrived!
description: The righteous prosecutor of the Public Security Club

name: Khawana
background: Despite being the clever younger sister of the Great Chief, Khawana holds no political ambitions and is instead far more interested in spending quality time with friends and family, collecting interesting things, and experiencing new cultures.

skills.name: Hey There!
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with sharp sickles, with a 35% chance each to inflict two bleeding effects for 2 turns. If the enemy is debuffed after the attack, additional damage is inflicted.

skills.name: Casual Introduction
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a flame guardian, increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns. When all allies are Fire elemental Heroes, grants all allies skill nullifier once.

skills.name: Rough Welcome
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a flame guardian, stunning for 1 turn before dispelling two buffs. Increases damage dealt when all allies are Fire elemental Heroes.

damageModifiers.name: skill_dmg_rate
damageModifiers.description: Increases damage dealt when all allies are Fire elemental Heroes.

specialtySkill.name: Stay Positive!
specialtySkill.description: She solves many problems with her positive attitude and constant hard work.

description: A curious and cheerful adventurer from Meldrec

name: Khawazu
background: A warrior of the Emberstorm tribe who ascended to Great Chief at a young age. He leads Meldrec with a stubborn insistence not to rely on outside assistance, but due to conflict between tribes, invading Unknowns, and the disappearance of Malicus, his troubles are starting to pile up.

skills.name: Flame Strike
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a ball of flame, with a 25% chance to burn for 2 turns.

skills.name: Composure
skills.description:
All debuffs are dispelled and Burning Vitality is activated if attacked while debuffed. Can only be activated once every 3 turn(s).
Burning Vitality: Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns.

skills.name: Emberstorm
skills.description: Attacks with a fiery explosion, making the target unhealable for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Unshakeable Will
specialtySkill.description: Right or wrong, he has the will to see his decisions through to the end.

summonQuote: I am the leader of Meldrec.
description: The Great Chief of Meldrec who is undergoing a difficult trial

name: Kitty Clarissa
background: The Holy Order of the Blue Cross requested that Reingar find a way to calm Clarissa down. Instead, the researchers focused on how cats can still be loved after wreaking havoc. Then they turned her into a cat to eliminate everyone's complaints about her violence.

skills.name: Get Away, Meow!
skills.description: Attacks with a morning star. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. If the caster is granted loveliness, triggers Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.

skills.name: Meow I'm Angry!
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a morning star while raging, with a 60% chance to decrease buff duration by 2 turn and make them unhealable for 2 turns. If the caster is granted loveliness, effect chance increases by 20%.

skills.name: I'm So Cute, Meow
skills.description: Wiggles tail cutely, decreasing debuff duration on all allies by 2 turns, and granting the caster immunity and loveliness for 3 turns before granting an extra turn.

specialtySkill.name: Cat's Nature
specialtySkill.description: She's very violent, but she's too adorable to be hated.

summonQuote: Are you my new servant, meow?
description: Battle-driven sister of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross who turned into a cat

name: Leo
background: Born to a family of scholars, Leo grew up learning much of warriors and myth. He is bravely traveling with his pet and good friend Racoo, in hope of realizing his dream of becoming a warrior himself.

skills.name: Sparrow Dive
skills.description: Attacks with a slingshot, with a 25% chance to stun for 1 turn.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Fox Hunt
skills.description: Attacks with a slingshot, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and a 50% chance to use Sparrow Dive.

skills.name: Flying Racoo
skills.description: Racoo flies into the enemies like a bullet and attacks all of them, decreasing Speed for 2 turns, with a 75% chance to stun.

specialtySkill.name: Kid Detective
specialtySkill.description: Sometimes an unbiased look can discover the truth.

summonQuote: I am the aspiring warrior, Leontius Leo! And this is my friend, Racoo! Nice to meet you.
description: A trouble making joker who dreams of becoming the ultimate warrior

name: Lots
background: Originally a part of the Order of the Blue Cross, Lots was dispatched to Reingar, where he studied healing magic. Wanting to test his abilities and find a rare magical item, he has left on a journey.

skills.name: Holy Light
skills.description: Attacks with a light sphere, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn.

skills.name: Regen
skills.description: Uses healing magic to recover Health and increase Combat Readiness by 80% of ally, before increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 30%. Amount recovered is proportional to the allys max Health.

skills.name: Serenity
skills.description: Uses strengthening magic to recover Health, increase Combat Readiness by 10%, and grant continuous healing for 3 turns to all allies.

specialtySkill.name: Calm Darkness
specialtySkill.description: Those who are used to darkness don't lose their senses even in the midst of chaos.

summonQuote: I'm Lots, I'll do whatever you need.
description: A valiant healer searching for a rare magical item

name: Maya
background: An apprentice knight of the Order of the Shield, Maya boasts incredible arm strength. Finding great value in her work protecting people, she devoted herself to the Order of the Shield. She cares greatly for her family back home.

skills.name: Weak Blow
skills.description: Attack with a blunt weapon, with a 25% chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Concuss
skills.description: Attacks with a shield, with a 80% chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Fraudulent Cry
skills.description: Has a 35% chance to decrease Attack and provoke all enemies for 1 turn. Increases Defense of all allies for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Strong Arms
specialtySkill.description: Uses their buff arms to fight against injustice.

summonQuote: Oh, you were looking for me? Thank you!
description: A young knight with a strong arm and shield

name: Mercedes
background: A Homunculus placed in the care of Queen Diene some years previously, Mercedes has a poker face that gives away little emotion, but she grows quickly attached to those who show her kindness. Sometimes, she may awkwardly mimic others or repeat what they say.

skills.name: Divine Bolt
skills.description: Attacks two enemies with shock magic.

skills.name: Dimensional Rupture
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a massive light sphere. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases as enemies become fewer.

skills.name: Blazing Eye of Kal
skills.description: Releases the power of the Ancient Book to attack all enemies strongly. The lower the enemy's health, the greater the damage dealt.

specialtySkill.name: Eye of Kal's Bookmark
specialtySkill.description: The Eye of Kal's knowledge came from the Goddess Diche.

summonQuote: If that is your will, I will obey.
description: A blank-faced Homunculus chosen by The Last Spellbook

name: Purrgis
background: Believing life is all about hitting a jackpot, Purrgis loves to snoop around. Born in Farche, a poor region, he has suffered discrimination for many years, turning him into an opportunist obsessed with money.

skills.name: Falling Strike
skills.description: Mows down enemies with a great sword, with a 35% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns, and decrease Combat Readiness by 20%. Damage dealt is proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Get Lost!
skills.description: Hits all enemies when counterattacking, with a 15% chance to stun for 1 turn. Has a 20% chance to counterattack when attacked.

skills.name: Final Blow
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a powerful ground pound, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn. Increases effect chance by 100% when they have less than 30% Health. Damage dealt is proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Muscle Flexing
specialtySkill.description: Exaggerates frequently when bragging about his power.

summonQuote: Hmph, I only trust what I can see. What kind of fool believes in justice?
description: A sly mercenary dreaming of a jackpot

name: Rin
background: A brave and sturdy young girl, Rin was adopted by the great merchant Basar following the loss of her father, though she refuses to believe he is truly dead. She is full of ambition, but also good-natured with a strong sense of justice.

skills.name: Ring Throw
skills.description: Throws rings at the enemy, with a 75% chance to dispel one buff, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 15%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Dazzling Dance
skills.description: Dazzles the enemy with a dance, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and a 50% chance to use Ring Throw. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Showtime
skills.description: Heals all allies with an elegant dance, granting two random buff for 3 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Cat's Eyes
specialtySkill.description: Her cat eyes glow in the darkness.

summonQuote: Hey! Call me Rin.
description: A brave and stubborn young merchant girl

name: Roaming Warrior Leo
background: Born to a family of scholars, he dreamed of becoming a warrior from a young age. After his parents disappeared following a raid by the Axe Bandits, he pledged to become stronger and get his revenge. Believing that reforming the rotten world is the only way to become a true warrior, he roams around the world defeating evil.

skills.name: Fire Slingshot
skills.description: Attacks with a slingshot, with a 35% chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Damage dealt is increased when the enemy is debuffed.

damageModifiers.name: atk_rate
damageModifiers.description: Increased attack if at least 1 buff

skills.name: Fire Shockbomb
skills.description: Fires a shockbomb at the enemy, with a 80% chance to increase skill cooldown by 1 turn.

skills.name: Go, Racoo!
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with Racoo, with a 75% chance to plant a bomb for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Righteous Seer
specialtySkill.description: He will not falter in his determination to eradicate evil.

summonQuote: If rooting out evil is what warriors do, I'm already a warrior!
description: A warrior roaming the world to eradicate evil

name: Romann
background: Knight Captain of Lefundos, situated in Eureka the Northern Continent. Romann has no desire to be king despite being the cousin and successor of the current king, Schniel. Cynical and assertive, yet weak to affection.

skills.name: Gravity Arrow
skills.description: Shoots gravity arrows at the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by 8%, and increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 8%.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Gravitation
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a magic circle, with a 50% chance each to decrease Combat Readiness by 15% four times.

skills.name: Event Horizon
skills.description: Shoots a powerful gravity sphere at all enemies, dispelling all buffs and increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 50%. Damage dealt increases, the enemy is inflicted with two poison effects for 2 turns, and the caster's Combat Readiness increases by an additional 30% when the enemy is buffed.

specialtySkill.name: God of War
specialtySkill.description: A war hero who brought about many victories through careful strategizing.

summonQuote: Pleased to meet you.
description: Knight Captain of Lefundos, a sharp-tongued cynic

name: Rose
background: A close aide of Cecilia's, Rose followed her all the way from Wintenberg. She loves to fight and has a good sense of humor. Her belief is that the strongest warrior die with no regrets.

skills.name: Sequential Cutter
skills.description: Attacks with a sword, with a 50% chance to provoke for 1 turn if the caster's Health is more than 50%, or increase Defense of the caster for 1 turn if the caster's Health is less than 50%.

skills.name: Shield of Light
skills.description: Cover an ally with the Shield of Light, dispelling two debuffs and granting a barrier before increasing Combat Readiness by 10%. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Goddess of Victory
skills.description: Gives blessing to all allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns, and Combat Readiness by 15%.

specialtySkill.name: Mission Keeper
specialtySkill.description: Fear won't ever stop her.

summonQuote: So? I'm confident I can take you down. Do you want to spar with me?
description: Winning is the only way to survive! A warlike protector

ex_equip.name: Valkyrie Wing
ex_equip.description: A mysterious circlet that symbolizes strength and beauty, and is the source of Rose's Fighting Spirit.

enhancements.description: Activates all effects regardless of Health when using Sequential Cutter.
Applies the same effect to the caster when using Shield of Light.
Decreases skill cooldown of Goddess of Victory by 1 turn.

name: Schuri
background: A master of gunpowder weaponry, Schuri has a strong sense of pride and arrogance, though suffers a complex about his weak physical strength.

skills.name: Rapid Fire
skills.description: Attack the enemy with a pistol, with a 25% chance to inflict poison for 2 turns.

skills.name: Explosive Gentleman
skills.description: After delivering a critical hit, the caster gains 1 Focus, and the Combat Readiness of all allies except the caster is increased by 15%.

skills.name: Rifle Shot
skills.description: Shoots all enemies with a rifle. Enhanced into Full Burst when the number of stacked Focus is more than 3. Full Burst always results in a Critical Hit, decreasing Combat Readiness of all enemies by 30%.

specialtySkill.name: Deadly Blow
specialtySkill.description: Sharp instincts separate truth from falsehood.

summonQuote: Shall I play with you since you summoned me?
description: Brimming with confidence, it's the Explosive Gentleman

name: Serila
background: With her glamorous beauty and enchanting smile, she's the quintessential witch. She loves money, especially when using it to decorate herself with beautiful things. She doesn't go anywhere without her magical weapon, Chatty.

skills.name: Seduction
skills.description: Attacks with a flame of seduction, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

skills.name: Spirit Absorb
skills.description: Absorbs the enemy's Attack, increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns before recovering Health proportional to the damage dealt, with a 60% chance to decrease Attack of the enemy for 2 turns. When the enemy is defeated, cooldown does not increase.

skills.name: Flame Kiss
skills.description: Swallows the enemy in the flame of Chatty, the magic lantern, with a 85% chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Genius
specialtySkill.description: Makes the impossible possible with their brilliance and genius.

summonQuote: Oh my, you were looking for me?
description: A glamorous witch who loves beautiful things

name: Shadow Rose
background: Rose was ready and willing to follow Cecilia anywhere, until she had her heart completely shattered. Now she is an obsessive and fiercely persistent war machine.

skills.name: Sequential Cutter
skills.description: Attacks with a sword, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense if the target's Health is more than 50%, or a 50% chance to make them unhealable for 1 turn if the target's Health is less than 50%.

skills.name: Spear of Darkness
skills.description: Leaps into the air and strikes at the enemy with a swordstorm, dispelling one buff and decreasing Defense for 2 turns.

skills.name: Goddess of Ruin
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with aura of destruction, decreasing their Combat Readiness by 25%. Increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 25%.

specialtySkill.name: Courage
specialtySkill.description: True courage means facing your fears.

summonQuote: Roseria Dart has been called to arms.
description: A protector walking the path of blood as a shadow of a precious thing

name: Shooting Star Achates
background: At best, a free spirit, at worst, an irresponsible hedonist. Shooting Star Achates finds a life without stimulus meaningless, and is always on the lookout for trouble.

skills.name: Magic Design
skills.description: Attacks with staff, with a 50% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

skills.name: Resurrection Magic
skills.description: Revives a dead ally with recovery magic and grants immortality for 1 turn. If the target is not dead, grants immortality and two random buffs for 3 turns.

skills.name: Sparkling Star
skills.description: Between the caster and the target, heals the ally with the lowest Health to the point their Health matches the other, before healing further on top. Effect is unaffected by Health buffs or debuffs. Health recovered is proportional to the max Health of each ally.

specialtySkill.name: Achates's Cheer
specialtySkill.description: No matter how desperate the situation may be, she will always root for you.

summonQuote: A new friendship begins with a One! Two! Three! Ta-da!
description: A whimsical and lovable wandering healer

name: Silk
background: A young Elf born in Dun Blyraia, the Eternal Forest. At a young age Silk left the forest, meaning she knows little of her own race and her home. Her personality is bright and cheerful like a spring breeze.

skills.name: Single Shoot
skills.description: Shoots arrows at the enemy, decreasing their Combat Readiness by 7%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Concentration
skills.description: Gains 1 Focus at the end of the turn, and consumes 1 Focus when attacked. If the caster's stacked Focus is more than 2, Single Shoot is enhanced to Automatic Fire and damage dealt is increased.

skills.name: Storm Arrow
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with wind, with a 85% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns, and granting increased Speed to all allies for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Wind Direction
specialtySkill.description: Maybe it sounds like wind, but it's really a song sent from the forest.

summonQuote: I love running with the wind!
description: A gentle Elf walking within the Eternal Wind

name: Surin
background: Coming from the East with her sentient weapon Mann, Surin vaguely remembers the journey that brought her to Ritania, but nothing else. Following Mann's voice, she embarks on a journey to find her lost memories.

skills.name: Chain Dagger
skills.description: Attacks with a chain axe. If the enemy is bleeding, causes two bleeding effects for 2 turns.

skills.name: Edge Smash
skills.description: Batters the enemy with a chain axe and inflicts two to four bleeding effects for 2 turns, decreasing Attack for 1 turn.

skills.name: Implosion
skills.description: Detonates all the bleeding effects currently inflicted on the enemy. Damage dealt increases proportional to the number of bleeding effects inflicted on the enemy, and debuff duration is extended by 1 turn. Additionally, the caster's Combat Readiness increases by 15% per every bleeding effect inflicted on the enemy. Effect can only be applied up to 5 times.

damageModifiers.name: target_debuff_rate
damageModifiers.description: Bonus damage increased on first bleed.

specialtySkill.name: Sword-Forged Path
specialtySkill.description: She handles every situation as if she's handling a sword.

summonQuote: Nice to meet you, call me Surin.
description: A calm and composed warrior from the East

name: Tera-Phantasma
background: A magical creature that has lived since before time began, seen by some as a spiritual guardian and others as an omen of catastrophe. They are rumored to share their power with those heroes they judge worthy.

skills.name: Gnaw
skills.description: Attacks with sharp teeth.

skills.name: Phantasma Seeds
skills.description: The item will be at max level when you receive it, and earn a bonus 10% EXP in battle.

description: A shadow of glory overflowing with power and wisdom

name: Troublemaker Crozet
background: Crozet's Moonlight Shade who does as he pleases with no consideration for anyone around him. Because he does whatever he wants, he's caused a lot of trouble, which has led Crozet himself to come looking for Troublemaker Crozet.

skills.name: Pledgeguard
skills.description: Attacks the enemy in an act of faith, with a 20% chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Chivalry
skills.description: Receives 20% of damage suffered by the ally in the back row in their place. Only the highest damage distribution effect will be applied. Has a 35% chance to counterattack when the ally in the back row is attacked.

skills.name: Oath of Protection
skills.description: Swears an oath of protection, dispelling all debuffs from the caster and one ally, before increasing Defense for 3 turns. Grants class enhancement to the ally for 3 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Flame of Passion
specialtySkill.description: Today marks the day he told the 486th girl that he loves her.

description: A reckless knight surrounded by rumors and scandals

name: Wanderer Silk
background: An Elf born on the outskirts of Dun Blyraia, the Eternal Forest. Raised by the World Tree that pitied her, Silk is fiercely proud, but forever yearning for her people.

skills.name: Basic Shoot
skills.description: Shoots arrows at the enemy, with a 40% chance to cause bleeding for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's speed.

skills.name: Automatic Fire
skills.description: Fires a volley of arrows at the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by 10%. Has a 50% chance of granting an extra attack of the same kind, increasing by an additional 50% when the target is debuffed. Damage is proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Shock Arrow
skills.description: Shoots an arrow infused with the power of lightning, inflicting silence and making them unhealable for 2 turns, and decreasing Combat Readiness to 0%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

specialtySkill.name: Calm Before the Storm
specialtySkill.description: She keeps on her toes, knowing danger lurks around every corner.

summonQuote: Did you miss me? Tell me the truth!
description: A fiercely proud Elf left alone in the Eternal Forest

ex_equip.name: Dun Blyraia's Dark Blessing
ex_equip.description: A quiver made with Mana from the dimension that Wanderer Silk came from, known to maximize her concentration.

enhancements.description: Grats the caster an extra attack regardless of whether the enemy is debuffed when using Automatic Fire.
Dispels one buff from the enemy when using Shock Arrow. (This effect is applied before inflicting silence.)
Increases Speed of all allies for 2 turns when using Shock Arrow.

name: Watcher Schuri
background: A member of the Sicar assassin organization, Watcher Schuri is an outstanding fighter, but ignorant of the ways of the world. Though his rigid way of speaking gives off an air of unapproachability, he is surprisingly straightforward and open to granting people's requests. However, he hides a secret he cannot share with others.

skills.name: Sniper
skills.description: Shoots the enemy with a rifle, with a 35% chance to target them for 2 turns.

skills.name: Quickfire
skills.description: Shoots all enemies with a rifle, with a 75% chance to dispel one buff. The caster is granted increased speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Mana Release
skills.description: Shoots a magic bullet at the enemy, penetrating their Defense.

specialtySkill.name: Hypervision
specialtySkill.description: He can see through everything.

summonQuote: Let's do our best together.
description: A secretive Sicar assassin

name: Zerato
background: The frost mage of Reingar, Zerato is the second son of a Spirit Weaver clan, blessed by Nixied, the Lord of Winter. He's a genius who hates to feel hot, and loves showing off. Like most Reingar students he pays no attention to those things he deems unimportant, and often crosses the line in his study of magic.

skills.name: Ice Thorn
skills.description: Attacks an enemy with an ice pick, with a 40% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Ice Pick
skills.description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly and increases the casters Combat Readiness by 50%. Damage dealt is increased when the enemy is debuffed.

damageModifiers.name: target_debuff_rate
damageModifiers.description: Increased damage if target is debuffed. Max once.

skills.name: Iceberg
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a giant iceberg, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn.

specialtySkill.name: Genius of Geniuses
specialtySkill.description: Gifted with natural talent and the blessing of Nixied, nobody can best him.

summonQuote: Will I finally meet someone who can take me on?
description: A genius frost mage who will freeze everything

name: Adlay
background: A young boy with wild dreams of becoming a legendary hero, or meeting the Heir of the Covenant, in reality Adlay is a rather plain and timid student. He wants to stand out but very ordinary.

skills.name: Mana Release
skills.description: Attacks with the power of a magical tome, with a 25% chance to stun for 1 turn.

skills.name: Heroic
skills.description: Combat Readiness increases by 9% every time an ally is attacked, and skill cooldown is reset when an ally dies.

skills.name: Mana Seal
skills.description: Deals huge damage to all enemies with a sealing spell, with a 50% chance to increase skill cooldown by 1 turn.

specialtySkill.name: Legend of Legend
specialtySkill.description: Believing himself to be a legendary warrior, he uses his power to overcome adversity.

summonQuote: Dream big! Then you won't feel sorry even if you can't make it, right?
description: A daydreaming student dreaming of becoming a legendary hero

name: Ains
background:
A fighter known among the criminal underground as the Aakhen
Outlaw, Ains has committed a lot of crimes with his simple and bravado-driven personality. He once had a strong reputation for taking care of the people around him, but after escaping prison he became incredibly selfish.

skills.name: Gazelle Punch
skills.description:
Punches the enemy, with a 50% chance to use Satisfying Strike instead of Gazelle Punch.
Satisfying Strike: A successful attack always results in a critical hit.

skills.name: Gash
skills.description: When attacked, has a 40% chance to counterattack.

skills.name: Ram
skills.description: Punches the enemy, with an 85% chance to stun for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Egomania
specialtySkill.description: Under any circumstances, he makes decisions based only on his own interests.

summonQuote: Let's try doing things my way.
description: A reckless backstreet brawler

name: Aither
background: Aither is the royal child of Ezera. He is bright and energetic, but he does not like those people who treat him as a weak boy. He desires to make his name as a brave knight one day, just like his mother.

skills.name: Whispering Spirit
skills.description: Attacks with spirit power, with a 40% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Guard
skills.description: Recovers an ally's Health with water energy while dispelling 2 debuffs, before increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 20%. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health and the caster's Attack.

skills.name: Spirit's Call
skills.description: Recovers Health of all allies and casts a barrier for 2 turns with spirit power. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health, and barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Attack.

specialtySkill.name: First Aid
specialtySkill.description: With his warm touch, there's nothing he can't heal.

summonQuote: Wow! Me? You're greeting me? Really? Wah! Ahaha! I'm so excited!
description: The Kingdom's lovable, enthusiastic prince!

name: Alexa
background: Despite her young age, Alexa has managed to become a formally appointed knight of the Order of the Sword trusted with all kinds of duties. She greatly admires Iseria, who taught her how to use a sword.

skills.name: Fell
skills.description: Cuts the enemy with dual-wielded swords. A critical hit will grant an extra attack. Can only be activated once per turn

skills.name: Cold Edge
skills.description: Attacks with a cold blade with a 80% chance to inflict two poison effects for 2 turns, and increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 30%.

skills.name: Crushing Blow
skills.description: Attacks the enemy continuously, dealing damage proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.

specialtySkill.name: Excellent Instructor
specialtySkill.description: She's contributed greatly to helping knights in their development.

summonQuote: Before the Goddess, I vow to do my best.
description: A faithful and honest member of the Order of the Sword

name: Angelic Montmorancy
background: Even after being formally appointed a nun, Montmorancy keeps making mistakes. However, instead of blaming herself and asking others for help, she perseveres in her efforts to help others.

skills.name: Sleep Sorcery
skills.description: Attack the enemy with water energy, with a 25% chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn.

skills.name: Purification
skills.description: Dispels one debuff from all allies, and heals debuffed allies. Amount recovered is proportional to the ally's max Health.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Effect is granted to all allies.
skills.name: Watery Curtain
skills.description: Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns, dispelling 2 debuffs. Also increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Heartfelt Care
specialtySkill.description: Her gentle touch will drive pains away.

description: A hardworking nun doing her best to help weak and poor souls

name: Arowell
background: Doris Rutton's personal bodyguard, Arowell often comes off as stiff due to her serious personality. She is willing to follow Doris anywhere, and will protect her at any cost.

skills.name: Shield Thrust
skills.description: Attacks with a sword and a shield, with a 50% chance to dispel two buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Escort
skills.description: Grants a barrier to the ally with the lowest Health for 2 turns at the beginning of the battle and each time the caster takes a turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Defensive Position
skills.description: Attacks with a sword, with a 75% chance to stun for 1 turn and decreases Combat Readiness by 30%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: It's Basic
specialtySkill.description: In order to defend your client, some basic hunting is required.

summonQuote: Were you looking for me?
description: A bodyguard who will protect her lady at any cost

name: Azalea
background: An officer of the Reingar Public Security Club, Azalea is mainly responsible for guarding the library and catching book thieves. Despite being trusted with many leadership duties, she has a history of continuously failing to be appointed to the Student Council.

skills.name: Persistent Attack
skills.description: Stabs the enemy with a spear and recovers own Health proportional to max Health.

skills.name: Challenging Blow
skills.description: Attacks the enemy, with a 80% chance each of provoking and making them unable to be healed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Sweep
skills.description: Sweeps the enemy with a spear, with a 65% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Sharp Insight
specialtySkill.description: With sharp eyes, she thwarts those that would do evil.

summonQuote: Order! I am an officer of the Reingar Public Security Club, Azalea Pormia!
description: A faithful officer with a duty to maintain order

name: Bask
background: With no particular religious faith, and wishing solely to become stronger, he joined the Order of the Sword. His only goal is to have his name remembered by future generations as a powerful knight and he cannot understand anyone who dies in the service of faith or personal beliefs.

skills.name: Protective Strike
skills.description: Slashes with a sword, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Shield Blow
skills.description: Attacks with a shield, with a 85% chance to dispel all buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Will of Protection
skills.description: Covers all allies with the Will of Protection, granting immunity for 3 turns, before granting a barrier to the caster for 3 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Strong Will
specialtySkill.description: He's always training, determined to become the strongest knight.

summonQuote: My name is Bask Royceman, an escort of the Order of the Sword. I look forward to working with you.
description: An impious knight of the Order of the Sword

name: Batisse
background: Batisse gained incredible power after using his teacher, Hataan, and other companions to obtain the Fighter's Mask. Intoxicated by that power, he murdered them all except for Hataan and disappeared. As time passed, the power the mask gave him grew stronger, but in return, his sense of self is becoming increasingly blurred.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Activates Rock Smash even when used against enemy without decreased Attack.
skills.name: Brawl
skills.description:
Hits the enemy in the face. When used against an enemy inflicted with decreased Attack, activates Rock Smash.
Rock Smash: Attacks all enemies.

skills.name: Justified Provoke
skills.description: At the start of the turn, has an 85% chance to decrease Attack of the enemy with the highest Combat Readiness for 2 turns.

skills.name: Certain Victory
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with blindingly fast speed. When used against enemy with decreased Attack, decreases Defense for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Boundless Obsession
specialtySkill.description: He can never give up his quest for power, even though he knows that it will be his doom.

summonQuote: A world in which only the strong survive...? I like that.
description: A tragic fighter craving power

name: Butcher Corps Inquisitor
background: The main duty of the Church of Ilryos Butcher Corps is to track down and punish traitors or fugitives.

skills.name: Heavy Strike
skills.description: Strikes the enemy with a blade, with a 35% chance each to dispel two buffs.

skills.name: Butcher Corps Gear
skills.description: Damage suffered in one attack does not exceed 50% of max Health.

skills.name: Hack
skills.description: Strikes downwards at the enemy indiscriminately, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health, and recovering Health proportional to the damage dealt.

specialtySkill.name: Know-How
specialtySkill.description: Inquisitors know how to defeat their enemies easily with the knowledge they've acquired from Ilyros.

summonQuote: God wills it!
description: Butcher Corps soldiers fighting for the Church of Ilryos

name: Captain Rikoris
background: Rikoris joined the Taranor Army on Schuri's advice and mastered his skills of spearmanship in a battle against the Chaos Sect. Now he spends his time trying to ease the unrest in Taranor while becoming the greatest spearman ever.

skills.name: Quick Pierce
skills.description: Attacks with a spear, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Effect chance increases by 25% when the caster is granted increased Speed.

skills.name: Cheer
skills.description: Encourage all allies, decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn and increasing Speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Supreme Spear
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with hard-trained spear art, with a 75% chance to dispel a buff from the target before having a 75% chance to stun an enemy with the highest Combat Readiness regardless of skill miss. Recovers caster's Health after attack. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack.

specialtySkill.name: Endless Effort
specialtySkill.description: In order to become the best spearman, he continues to practive every day.

description: A trustworthy captain with his own unique spearmanship

name: Carmainerose
background: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. Reminiscent of the shriveled rose petals the day after a festival, Carmainerose dazzles her opponents by singing a song of her failed revenge.

skills.name: Vampirism
skills.description: Claws the enemy, absorbing some of the damage as Health.

skills.name: Vengeful Strike
skills.description: Attacks the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by 35%, and decreasing Speed of the enemy and increasing Speed of the caster for 2 turns each.

skills.name: Daze
skills.description: Attacks the enemy, dispelling all buffs, and increasing Attack and Defense of the caster for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Combat Maniac
specialtySkill.description: Her thirst for blood and victory knows no bounds. She'll do anything for it.

summonQuote: Why did you call me?
description: A half-burned, blood-red, depressed Banshee

name: Carrot
background: A member of the Magic Research Institute, Carrot sometimes helps the Student Council with their accounting at the request of Ginger and Hazel due to her talent with numbers. She is usually rational, except for her habit of wearing decorative ears to ward off jinxes.

skills.name: Swing
skills.description: Attacks with a staff, with a 35% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns, before a 30% chance to detonate burn effects inflicted on the enemy at the end of the turn.

skills.name: Flame Barrier
skills.description: After being attacked, grants the caster a barrier for 1 turn and burns the attacker for 1 turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

skills.name: Blaze Explosion
skills.description: Attack with a powerful fire, with a 60% chance to burn for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Surprising Chef
specialtySkill.description: Cooking and battling require precise calculations and perfect planning.

summonQuote: Efficiency in everything I do! Especially magic and math.
description: A sassy magic researcher who sees all magic as math

name: Celeste
background: Currently working as a private mercenary, Celeste used to be a member of Aramintha's Silver Blade Company long ago. She says little and has an earnest and very serious personality, but suffers from thinking too much and an inability to choose.

skills.name: Precision Fire
skills.description: Attacks the enemy, with a 50% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

skills.name: Volley
skills.description: Shoots a volley of arrows at all enemies, with a 50% chance to decrease Combat Readiness by 20%. Does not increase cooldown count when the caster's Health is more than 80%.

skills.name: Defcon
skills.description: Caster recovers 30% Health and is granted an extra turn and increased Attack for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Silent Sharpshooter
specialtySkill.description: When looking for clues, she's as calm and precise as when she's drawing a bow.

summonQuote: I will do my best.
description: A calm and collected mercenary who loves forests and silence

name: Chaos Inquisitor
background: Following an argument with the Chaos Sect Axe, he left the Chaos Sect only to be captured soon after by the Rose Apostles. During a narrow escape, he became filled with a desperate fear of death and was awakened to the existence of Chaos.

skills.name: Heavy Strike
skills.description: Hacks the enemy down with a sword, with a 35% chance each to dispel two buffs.

skills.name: Butcher Corps Gear
skills.description: Damage suffered in one attack does not exceed 50% of max Health.

skills.name: Preach
skills.description: Attacks the enemy in the name of Chaos, recovering Health proportional to damage dealt. When the enemy is buffed, has a 50% chance to activate Heavy Strike. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

specialtySkill.name: Unshaken Faith
specialtySkill.description: His faith in Chaos is resolute.

description: A fanatic enlightened to the grace of Chaos

name: Chaos Sect Axe
background: Following the end of the Archdemon War, the Church of Ilryos Axe suffered a difficult period of desolation, until the God of Chaos spoke to him. Inspired to found the Chaos Sect, he has found a new purpose to subdue the world under the blade of his axe.

skills.name: Disconnect
skills.description: Attacks with an axe. A critical hit will inflict bleeding for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

skills.name: Attack Chain
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a shockwave, granting an extra turn to the caster if an enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the enemy's lost Health.

skills.name: Vigorous Strike
skills.description: Smacks the enemy, with a 80% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns and recover Health by 20% of max Health. Amount recovered increases by 50% if an enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Some Doctrine
specialtySkill.description: To end their suffering, they chose a doctrine of heresy.

summonQuote: A world governed by Chaos is coming!
description: An axeman who accepted the call of Chaos and founded the Chaos Sect.

name: Church of Ilryos Axe
background: A fanatical soldier who believes in the Church of Ilryos, fighting against those who seek to oppress it, and punishing traitors.

skills.name: Disconnect
skills.description: Attacks with an axe. A critical hit will inflict bleeding for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

skills.name: Attack Chain
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a shockwave, granting an extra turn to the caster if an enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the enemy's lost Health.

skills.name: Plagued Strike
skills.description: Smacks the enemy, with a 80% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Some Doctrine
specialtySkill.description: To end their suffering, they chose a doctrine of heresy.

summonQuote: The Church of Ilryos saves all!
description: An axeman following the Church of Ilryos

name: Commander Lorina
background: Lorina became an official knight after defeating a Wyvern with her spear. She aims to lead the vanguard of the Order of the Shield one day, and acts without thinking based on what she believes is right.

skills.name: Sharp Blow
skills.description: Knocks the enemy into the air with a spear, increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 20%.

skills.name: Spiritual Armament
skills.description: Increases Attack 10% each time the caster attacks an enemy. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.

skills.name: Spiral Breakthrough
skills.description: Pierces the enemy with a spear, decreasing Combat Readiness by 15%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

specialtySkill.name: Faithful Spear
specialtySkill.description: Through faith she can overcome moments of weakness and doubt.

summonQuote: Please, call me Lorina.
description: Vice-Commander of The Order of the Shield with outstanding talent

name: Doris
background: Born to a noble Taranor family, Doris was forced to flee to Reingar after receiving a huge inheritance to escape her greedy stepmother. She wants to heal those wounded with her magic.

skills.name: Mana Bullet
skills.description: Attacks with light energy, with a 50% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

skills.name: Celebration of Light
skills.description: Recites the Celebration of Light, recovering the Health of all allies and granting continuous healing and increased Defense for 2 turns. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

skills.name: Light Curtain
skills.description: Recovers an ally's Health and increases their Combat Readiness by 30% with light magic. If granted continuous healing, the amount of Health recovered is doubled. Healing is proportional to the ally's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Family Heritage
specialtySkill.description: The knowledge of past generations guides her.

summonQuote: I'll do my best not to let you down.
description: A noble lady who embraces those wounded

name: Eaton
background: A mysterious Golem who stops people from entering certain areas, his muddled memories mean he doesn't know what he is protecting or why. Recently, he has begun to question whether he really ever was a Human, or if he is simply a Golem with the memories of a Human. Every time he encounters Humans he approaches them out of pure curiosity, but often ends up fighting them due to a rumor that was spread in the past.

skills.name: Come Here
skills.description: Strongly knees the enemy, with a 75% chance each to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: I Protect
skills.description: Receives 10% of damage taken by an ally in their place. Only the highest damage distribution effect will be applied. Increases max Health by 10%.

skills.name: I'm Tough
skills.description: Releases strong energy, dispelling all debuffs inflicted on the caster before granting a barrier and immunity for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Fruits of Anguish
specialtySkill.description: He eventually comes to find a meaningful answer after a while lost in meaningless thoughts.

summonQuote: Good to meet you. My...name is...Eaton.
description: A lonely guard with fading memories

name: Elson
background: A knight apprentice of the Order of the Sword, Elson. He is originally from Ezera, yet his parents left for Savara to set up a business of their own. He is kind and friendly but lacks confidence.

skills.name: Heavy Strike
skills.description: Attacks the enemy, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn.

skills.name: Meteor Shower
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with Meteor Shower of Light and recovers the Health of all allies. Healing increases proportional to the ally's max Health.

skills.name: Light's Protection
skills.description: Recovers Health and increases Attack and Defense of all allies for 2 turns with strengthening magic. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Struggle
specialtySkill.description: He's always struggled to prove himself as a real knight.

summonQuote: I'm still an apprentice, but I'll do my best!
description: A kind and friendly Order of the Sword apprentice

name: Enott
background: A nasty, arrogant and ambitious man with an inflated sense of his own abilities, Enott used his connections with a noble Ezera family to become a priest of the Rose Apostles.

skills.name: Smash
skills.description: Attacks with an axe, with a 30% chance to cause bleeding for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

skills.name: Judgment
skills.description: Attacks with a sharp blow, with a 50% chance each to decrease Defense and make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Prepare Judgment
skills.description: Corrects stance, increasing Attack and Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns, and Combat Readiness by 30%.

specialtySkill.name: Pharmacy of Apostles
specialtySkill.description: A maker of medicine to heal wounds and food to stimulate thought.

summonQuote: Hmph, pleased to meet you.
description: A sly and selfish priest of the Rose Apostles

name: Falconer Kluri
background: Kluri started raising a falcon in hope of reducing her workload. Although it ended up doing the exact opposite, she's carried on raising it for fun. Perhaps it learned from its master, because it will never do anything too difficult unless Kluri orders it to.

skills.name: Light Step
skills.description: Slams the enemy, increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Magic Resist
skills.description: Recovers 5% Health at the beginning of every turn.

skills.name: Fluri, Attack!
skills.description: Fluri flies towards the enemy, with a 75% chance to dispel all buffs, before a 75% chance each to provoke and decrease Defense for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Born in the Woods
specialtySkill.description: She can smell the woods even from the middle of a desert.

summonQuote: I'm Kluri, a mercenary. My motto is minimum effort, maximum reward, so don't give me anything too difficult.
description: Fluri's friend. A sharp-eyed mercenary

name: Giga-Phantasma
background: A magical creature that has collected immense power over the course of its eternal life. Hunted down by countless warriors and magicians desperate to possess its concentrated power, it is now extremely hard to find.

skills.name: Gnaw
skills.description: Attacks with sharp teeth.

skills.name: Phantasma Seeds
skills.description: The item will be at max level when you receive it, and earn a bonus 6% EXP in battle.

description: Strong power compressed into a shadow of glory

name: Gloomyrain
background: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. When the ruins are masked in fog, she sings songs of rumors. Looking like a small lantern flame flickering in the darkness, if you allow yourself to be tempted you will lose your life in a moment.

skills.name: Wail
skills.description: Has a 10% chance of being granted an extra turn after attacking the enemy. If the caster is debuffed, the chance is doubled.

damageModifiers.name: atk_rate
damageModifiers.description: Skill 2 increases attack, molagora increase even further.

skills.name: Ill Will
skills.description: Increases Speed and attack if inflicted with a debuff, and grants immunity to stun, provoke, or sleep.

skills.name: Soul Destruction
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with magic, with a 75% chance to transfer debuffs inflicted on the caster, before dispelling them from the caster.

damageModifiers.name: atk_rate
damageModifiers.description: Skill 2 increases attack, molagora increase even further.

specialtySkill.name: Fearful Defense
specialtySkill.description: Extreme fear can lead to disastrous results.

summonQuote: Uhh... Hello?
description: A Banshee like lonely rain falling on a foggy city

name: Gunther
background: A veteran of the Archdemon War, Gunther is often misunderstood because of his rough-looking face, but he is a highly-talented treasure hunter.

skills.name: Spirited Blow
skills.description: Attacks with an axe, with a 50% chance to cause bleeding for 2 turns.

skills.name: Veteran
skills.description: The caster does not deal a critical hit, but Attack increases by 50% and increases Critical Hit Resistance by 70%.

skills.name: Tenacious Strike
skills.description: Attacks with an axe, stunning for 1 turn and decreases Defense for 2 turns.

damageModifiers.name: target_debuff_rate
damageModifiers.description: Increased damage if target is bleeding. Max once.

specialtySkill.name: Veteran Mercenary
specialtySkill.description: He's diligent and skillful. War doesn't take place just on the battlefield.

summonQuote: The worth of a man is not determined by appearance but by actions. I'll forge my own way no matter what!
description: A carefree and tough warrior known as the Slaughterer

name: Hataan
background: A descendant of Suin taken as slaves by settlers from Ritania. He was able to earn his freedom at a young age thanks to the sacrifices of his family but had to become a street fighter in the criminal underground to survive. Just as he began opening up to others and finding inner peace, he lost all of his friends after his disciple Batisse went on a rampage. Now, he seeks revenge.

skills.name: Knee Smash
skills.description: Smashes the enemy with their knee, with a 50% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Wind Pressure
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with wind pressure. Activates Wind Pressure again when an enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Unbeatable Will
skills.description: Releases energy to all allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns, before increasing Speed of the caster for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Rigorous Training
specialtySkill.description: He relentlessly pushes himself to his limits in order to become stronger.

summonQuote: In this cruel world...only the strongest survive.
description: A wandering Suin burdened with guilt

name: Hazel
background: Younger sister of Ginger, the vice president of the student council, Hazel is the self-styled "Black Sheep" clerk of the student council. An inflexible, sharp-tongued slob, yet also an extensively knowledgeable model student. She has a detailed understanding of the personal relationships and weaknesses of everyone in Reingar.

skills.name: Book of Fire
skills.description: Attacks with fire magic, with a 30% chance to make unhealable for 2 turns.

skills.name: Urgent Regen
skills.description: Heals the ally proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health. If the ally's Health is less than 50%, the amount recovered will increase by 50%.

skills.name: Attack Command
skills.description: Heals all allies with strengthening magic, healing them and increasing Attack for 2 turns. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Knowledge Is Power
specialtySkill.description: Brain beat brawn every time.

summonQuote: I'm Hazel Stressa, Black Sheep-- Uhh, I mean, clerk of the Student Council.
description: The savvy model student clerk of the Student Council

name: Helga
background: Though small in stature, Helga is a fierce eyed bounty hunter who is never without her trademark axe and horned helm. Rough-spoken and rough-tempered, she has no time for those who look down on her, and prefers to work alone.

skills.name: Armor Rend
skills.description: Attacks with an axe, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

skills.name: Attack Chain
skills.description: Strongly slams the enemy with an axe. A critical hit will extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.

skills.name: Cry of Victory
skills.description: Encourages allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: One by One
specialtySkill.description: She shows no hesitation while defeating her enemies.

summonQuote: Don't you dare look down on me. I will gore you.
description: A treasure hunter with a love for big axes and horned helms

name: Hurado
background: Hurado is a mercenary with no memories, wandering in search for his home. Unlike his intimidating appearance, he is extremely kind and sincere, and vulnerable to being conned by others.

skills.name: Staff Strike
skills.description: Attacks with a staff, with a 35% chance to silence for 1 turn.

skills.name: Dark Magic
skills.description: Decreases amount recovered of all enemies by 35%, and increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 20% when the enemy uses a non-attack skill.

skills.name: Dark Explosion
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with dark magic, with a 80% chance to dispel all buffs before decreasing Combat Readiness by 15%.

specialtySkill.name: Pilgrim of Strange Land
specialtySkill.description: No matter where you are, just keep calm.

summonQuote: Nice meeting you.
description: Where am I from? A wandering mercenary who lost his memory

name: Jecht
background: A mercenary from the Itan Clan, Jecht is committed to self-discipline and hopes to improve the treatment of his fellow Suin by becoming a skilled and famous warrior.

skills.name: Staff Assault
skills.description: Attacks with a staff, with a 50% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

skills.name: Tailwind
skills.description: 80% chance to dispel one debuff inflicted on an ally at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Gale
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with wind magic, granting continuous healing and increased Speed to all allies for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Using Talent
specialtySkill.description: Uses his talents to improve how Suin are treated and portrayed.

summonQuote: I will do my best to live up to your expectations.
description: A hard worker who dreams of becoming the world's strongest mercenary

name: Jena
background: A calm and cautious mage of the Rose Apostles, Jena is rarely agitated by anything. She is childhood friends with fellow Rose Apostle, Lidica.

skills.name: Cold Blow
skills.description: Attacks with a staff, dealing damage proportional to number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.

damageModifiers.name: target_debuff_rate
damageModifiers.description: Increased damage per debuff on target.

skills.name: Coerce
skills.description: Casts weakening magic on all enemies, with a 35% chance to decrease Attack and Speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Cold Snap
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with frost magic, with a 50% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Steady
specialtySkill.description: With steady resolve you can solve anything.

summonQuote: Do you have some more work for me?
description: A composed mage of the Rose Apostles

name: Judith
background: A cute and cheerful member of Reingar's Public Security Club, Judith originally came to Reingar as a thief with her eyes on magical artifacts. However, she enjoyed her time in the Public Security Club so much, she eventually forgot her original goal. She is an old friend of the Longtail Company's commander, Armin.

skills.name: Weakness Attack
skills.description: Attacks with dual-wielded swords. When the caster is stealthed, has a 75% chance to stun the enemy.

skills.name: Urgent Evasion
