skills.description: When attacked, has a 70% chance to become stealthed for 1 turn.

skills.name: Mark of Acceleration
skills.description: Increases the Combat Readiness of allies by 20%, and grant stealth for 1 turn.

specialtySkill.name: Undercover
specialtySkill.description: She can go anywhere with her skills of subterfuge.

summonQuote: Public Security Club Officer Judith, reporting in!
description: A Public Security Club officer, who on second glance is revealed as a thief

name: Kikirat v2
background: Machinery based on the Kikirat. It has cleaning functionality for comfort, but often mistakes Humans fortrash.

skills.name: Auto-Fire
skills.description: Attacks with a gatling gun, with a 65% chance to dispel one buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Defense Mode
skills.description: Increases Defense of the caster by 7.0% after attacking. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.

skills.name: Cleaning Mode
skills.description: Fires indiscriminately at all enemies, with a 60% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn, before triggering counterattacks from the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

description: High-tech machinery\nmodeled after Gigantes

name: Kiris
background: An Elf of Dun Blyraia, Kiris left her home after losing her lover to the Archdemon War and joined the Sicar assassin organization. She is often absent-minded, but as you get to know her you discover she possesses an acute sense.

skills.name: Venomous Arrow
skills.description: Fires a poisoned arrow at the enemy, with a 35% chance to inflict poison for 2 turns.

skills.name: Corrosive Volley
skills.description: Fires a corrosive volley to all enemies, extending any debuff duration by 1 turn.

skills.name: Preparation
skills.description:
Strengthens the caster's next attack, granting an extra turn.
Venomous Arrow: Increases effect chance to 100%, and poison effects can be stacked up to 3 times.
Corrosive Volley: Extends debuff duration by 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Set Shifting
specialtySkill.description: Her attitude changes as soon as she begins pursuit.

summonQuote: Ah... did you call me?
description: A Sicar assassin with a lot to hide

name: Kluri
background: A member of Armin's Longtail Company, Kluri's only goal is to earn money to live a decent life. She hates anything that's tedious. Having left Dun Blyraia at a young age, she is unaware she is an Elf.

skills.name: Light Step
skills.description: Strikes in the direction of the enemy, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 15%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Magic Resist
skills.description: Recovers 5% Health at the beginning of a turn.

skills.name: Fortitude
skills.description: Has a 75% chance to provoke and decrease Defense for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Born in the Woods
specialtySkill.description: She can smell the woods even from the middle of a desert.

summonQuote: I'm Kluri, a mercenary. My motto is minimum effort, maximum reward, so don't give me anything too difficult.
description: A mercenary doing the bare minimum to earn her paycheck

name: Lena
background: Daughter of a family of sorcerers from Witchaven, the wandering fighter Hataan taught her martial arts and of the outside world as he passed through the city. After he left she lost interest in magic and worked to hone her fighting skills alone. Unsatisfied, she eventually left Witchaven as well to find Hataan and become his disciple.

skills.name: You're Soft
skills.description: Attacks with a strong fist, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 20%.

skills.name: Power Strike
skills.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 30%.

skills.name: Exposed!
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a powerful storm, decreasing Combat Readiness by 20%, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health. When the enemy is defeated with this skill, cooldown does not occur.

specialtySkill.name: Optimism
specialtySkill.description: She believes everything will work out well in the end.

summonQuote: It's a big world filled with strong people. That's what makes life fun.
description: An optimistic fighter who just stepped foot into the world

name: Lorina
background: An apprentice of the Order of the Shield, Lorina is constantly practicing to achieve her goal of becoming a knight. She thinks she's clever and confident, but in reality she's quite naive and easily tricked by others.

skills.name: Sharp Blow
skills.description: Knocks the enemy into the air with a spear, increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 20%.

skills.name: Spiritual Armament
skills.description: Increases Attack 10% each time the caster attacks an enemy. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.

skills.name: Resolve
skills.description: Jumps into the air and strikes down at the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

specialtySkill.name: Faithful Spear
specialtySkill.description: Through faith she can overcome moments of weakness and doubt.

summonQuote: Please, call me Lorina.
description: She may look skilled, but she's useless! An Order of the Shield apprentice

name: Mascot Hazel
background: Hazel disguised herself to recruit more members for the student council. Only a few know her true identity, and once she's finished with her business, she returns to her original appearance.

skills.name: Book of Fire
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with fire magic, with a 30% chance to make them unhealable, for 2 turns.

skills.name: Urgent Regen
skills.description: Heals the target proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health. If the ally's Health is less than 50%, the amount recovered will increase by 50%.

skills.name: A Girl in Uniform
skills.description: Encourages allies by increasing Attack of the target and all allies for 2 turns, and recovers Health of all allies. If the target is a Fire elemental Hero, grants the target increased Attack (Greater) instead. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health and the caster's Attack.

specialtySkill.name: Knowledge Is Power
specialtySkill.description: Brain beat brawn every time.

description: A pretty girl with stunning beauty

name: Mirsa
background: A mercenary and adventurer constantly going back and forth between Savara and the Great Desert, Mirsa's main business is treasure hunting. A child of nomads, she has no fixed home. Finding old ruins in the desert is one of her favorite things.

skills.name: Double Edge
skills.description: Attacks with dual-wielded swords, with a 35% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Brush Off
skills.description: Increases Evasion Chance by 35%. After successfully evading, decreases cooldown of the caster by 1 turn and increases Speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Raid
skills.description: Ambushes the target, silencing them for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to caster's Speed.

specialtySkill.name: Basic of Ambush
specialtySkill.description: She kills her targets quickly and silently.

summonQuote: The desert taught me that nothing is forever and nothing truly disappears.
description: A cool treasure hunter shining within a sandstorm

name: Mistychain
background: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. She sings songs of a passion frozen by painful betrayal. She is known to mercilessly tear things apart with her bare hands.

skills.name: Vampirism
skills.description: Claws the enemy, absorbing some of the damage to heal all allies.

skills.name: Curse of Banshee
skills.description: Casts a spell at the enemy, with a 80% chance to make them unhealable and decrease Attack for 2 turns.

skills.name: Life Drain
skills.description: Attacks by absorbing the enemy's life force. Some of the damage dealt is absorbed to heal all allies. When the enemy is defeated, grants revive to the ally with the lowest Health for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Beauty Recipe
specialtySkill.description: Finally, a recipe for beauty has been developed! I'm afraid to take it, though.

summonQuote: I'm... always sad.
description: A cold-blooded Banshee with an ice-cold scream

name: Montmorancy
background: An apprentice sister of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, Montmorancy is an understudy of Achates and Clarissa, the latter of which she likes very much. She is naive and often makes mistakes, but overcomes them with a positive attitude.

skills.name: Sleep Sorcery
skills.description: Attack the enemy with water energy, with a 25% chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn.

skills.name: Purification
skills.description: Dispels one debuff from all allies, and heals debuffed allies. Amount recovered is proportional to the ally's max Health.

skills.soulBurnEffect: All allies are affected by the effect.
skills.name: Watery Curtain
skills.description: Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns, while increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Sweet Medicine
specialtySkill.description: Sometimes you just need something delicious.

summonQuote: It's me, Montmorancy! It'll all work out... eventually! Yes!
description: A naive and hardworking apprentice nun

name: Mucacha
background: Living carefree as the leader of a group of thieves, Mucacha turned over a new leaf after meeting Cecilia and began an honest life as a follower of Corvus. He cherishes loyalty.

skills.name: Ancient Spear Art
skills.description: Attacks with a spear, increasing own Combat Readiness by 15%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Wild
skills.description: Increases Speed by 1% each time the caster attacks an enemy. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.

skills.name: Enlightened Blow
skills.description: Attacks with a fatal blow, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns and increase Speed of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

specialtySkill.name: Manly Man
specialtySkill.description: Come at me! As you know, experience always makes you stronger.

summonQuote: Right or wrong, I'll worry about that later!
description: A reformed thief, descended from Angara

name: Nemunas
background: Her nickname is Nemu. As a child, Nemunas was saved from the Dragon Valley by the Queen of Wintenberg and her Dragon Knights. At this point, she decided she must become a Dragon Knight. She left her home to participate in the Wintenberg Tournament to become a Dragon Knight.

skills.name: Cover Fire
skills.description: Decreases enemy's Combat Readiness by 10% after attacking them.

skills.name: Shock Arrow
skills.description: Powerfully shoots an arrow at the enemy, decreasing Hit Chance for 2 turns and Combat Readiness by 30%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the enemy's max Health.

skills.name: A Girl's Determination
skills.description: Encourages allies, dispelling one debuff. Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Hidden Eyes
specialtySkill.description: She can see farther and more accurately than anyone else.

summonQuote: I'm... Nemunas Winka... Oh, well, right here is where I am!
description: An archer of the Winka family longing to become a Dragon Knight

name: Otillie
background: Having escaped the Homunculus experiments in the Laboratory, Otillie went to Wetheric Moor, following her cloudy memory of the past. Her blank facial expression and lack of Human emotion makes it very hard to tell if she is lying. She is quick-witted with good conversational skills.

skills.name: Dark Arrow
skills.description: Attacks with dark energy, with a 35% chance to make the enemy unhealable for 2 turns.

skills.name: Area Defense
skills.description: Decreases damage received from AoE attacks for all allies by 25%. When this effect is granted more than once, only the strongest effect is applied.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by two 2 turns.
skills.name: Mana Release
skills.description: Exhales powerful darkness, decreasing Combat Readiness by 25%, making the enemy unable to be buffed, and inflicting Silence for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Fearless
specialtySkill.description: She is unrelenting in her advance; she does not know fear.

summonQuote: I'll help you as best I can.
description: An escaped Homunculus and bold-faced liar

name: Pearlhorizon
background: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. She sing songs of malice that flow slowly like dust. She is known to strangle opponent with a gentle and friendly face.

skills.name: Chaos Strike
skills.description: Claws the enemy, with a 35% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns.

skills.name: Hypnosis
skills.description: All enemies have a 35% chance to be put to sleep for 1 turn.

skills.name: Nightmare
skills.description: Attacks the enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. When the enemy is sleeping, extra damage is dealt equivalent to 20% of max Health.

damageModifiers.name: target_hp_rate
damageModifiers.description: Extra damage when target is asleep.

specialtySkill.name: Doll Collection
specialtySkill.description: This doll we found recently is in great condition. It almost seems as if it was alive.

summonQuote: Nice to meet you.
description: A quiet Banshee who strangles her enemies slowly

name: Pyllis
background: Part of the Church of Ilryos, Pyllis was originally Human before the Homunculus experiments changed her. She cannot remember anything from her time as a Human, but has a lingering feeling of being abandoned by a friend.

skills.name: Weak Blow
skills.description: Attacks the enemy, with a 50% chance to provoke. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

skills.name: Will
skills.description: Increase Defense when attacked. Increases Defense of all allies for 2 turns every fourth attack received. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Guard
skills.description: Attacks the enemy, and grants barrier on all allies for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases in proportion to the caster's Defense.

specialtySkill.name: Resemblance
specialtySkill.description: Unrepentant and without regret, she follows orders and thinks of herself as a machine.

summonQuote: I live to follow orders... Will that be enough?
description: A lonely Homunculus with missing memories

name: Ras
background: Created to protect the world and all life within it, he is admired as the leader of the Heirs and the alter ego of the Goddess. He has a good personality and is very understanding, though he lacks some understanding of Humans.

skills.name: X-Slash
skills.description: Attacks with a sword, with 75% chance to dispel a buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.soulBurnEffect: The skill cooldown decreases by 2 turns.
skills.name: Command Strike
skills.description: After successive attacks on the enemy, it will cause your strongest ally to Dual attack with you.

skills.name: Sword of the Heir
skills.description: Strongly attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, recovering Health and increasing Defense of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt and amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Blessings of Covenants
specialtySkill.description: The Heir of the Covenant bears the weight of the world upon his shoulders.

summonQuote: I'll do my duty today, too!
description: Heir of the Covenant, a defender of the world

name: Requiemroar
background: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. She sings a bizarrely pleasant song of brutal murder and mourning. Her funeral dirge is for the enemy she is about to kill.

skills.name: Insanity
skills.description: Claws the enemy, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn.

skills.name: Blood Feast
skills.description: All allies absorb 5% of the damage they each inflict as Health and recover 15% Health every time an enemy dies. Health recovery upon enemy death can only be activated once per turn.

skills.name: Dirge
skills.description: Attacks with magic, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 20%.

specialtySkill.name: Impossible Request
specialtySkill.description: Her requests, which you can never refuse, are becoming more and more unreasonable.

summonQuote: What do you want from me?
description: A crazed Banshee dancing to a funeral dirge

name: Researcher Carrot
background: Carrot studied tirelessly to pass the notorious Magic Research Department exam and became a professional researcher. She thought things would finally get better once she passed, but instead, she feels like she has gotten even busier.

skills.name: Swing
skills.description: Attacks with a staff, with a 35% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns, before a 30% chance to detonate burn effects inflicted on the enemy at the end of the turn.

skills.name: Flame Barrier
skills.description: After being attacked, grants the caster a barrier for 1 turn and burns the attacker for 1 turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

skills.name: Flame Spurt
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with powerful fire, with 60% chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns.

skillTree.description: Increases Swing's decrease Speed effect chance by 10%.
Increases damage dealt by Flame Spurt by 10%.
Combat Readiness increases by 10% when using Swing.
Has a 50% chance to dispel one debuff inflicated on the caster when Flame Barrier is activated.
Increases Flame Spurt's burn effect chance by 5%.
When the caster is attacked at max Health, decreases damage received by 25%.

specialtySkill.name: I'll Sleep When I'm Dead
specialtySkill.description: All researchers develop an ability to write piles of reports without sleeping for several days.

summonQuote: Efficiency in everything I do! Especially magic and math.
description: A sassy magic researcher who sees all magic as math

name: Righteous Thief Roozid
background: After learning about wicked merchants from Savara bamboozling the Suin, Roozid resolves to restore the riches illicitly taken from them. He goes through intensive training and finally emerges anew.

skills.name: Hemorrhage
skills.description: Cuts the enemy, with a 35% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Wind Slash
skills.description: Attacks with a swordstorm, with a 35% chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Moonlight Roar
skills.description: Increases Combat Readiness by 20% and grants increased Speed for 2 turns to all allies through the power of the moon. Also grants the caster continuous heal for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Food Master
specialtySkill.description: Not very popular, but a great cook. A self-taught chef from his days leading a group of nomads.

description: A righteous thief who fights for those in need

name: Rikoris
background: A founding member of the Spear Club, Rikoris got caught up with Azalea and began helping out with the Public Security Club. He often lacks common sense, and is weak to the requests of others.

skills.name: Quick Pierce
skills.description: Attacks with a spear, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Effect chance increases by 25% when the caster is granted increased Speed.

skills.name: Cheer
skills.description: Encourage all allies, decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn and increasing Speed for 2 turns.

skills.name: Flash Cut
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a shockwave, with a 75% chance to dispel one buff.

specialtySkill.name: Righteous Helper
specialtySkill.description: He can't turn his back on anyone who asks for help.

summonQuote: The spear is my passion, my specialty, my life. Hmm, if there's anything you need, feel free to ask haha!
description: A kind, weak-hearted member of the Spear Club

name: Rima
background: An energetic and cheerful girl, Rima is a master archer who spends her time as a wandering minstrel. Otherwise fearless and daring, she is terrified of mice.

skills.name: Quick Shot
skills.description: Attacks with a quick shooting. A critical hit will decrease the caster's skill cooldown by 1 turn.

skills.name: Lullaby Arrow
skills.description: Shoots an arrow infused with a sleep toxin, with a 75% chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn.

skills.name: War Hymn
skills.description: Encourages an ally, except for the caster, decreasing skill cooldown for 3 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Bard
specialtySkill.description: A beautiful melody can heal a weary body and soul.

summonQuote: You finally called for me? Thank you!
description: A wandering minstrel with a talent for the bow

name: Roozid
background: A quiet and kind young canine Suin of the Itan Clan, despite struggling to feed even himself, Roozid makes sure the sandcats of the Great Desert do not starve either. He admires Cartuja greatly.

skills.name: Hemorrhage
skills.description: Cuts the enemy with dual-wielded swords, with a 35% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Wind Slash
skills.description: Attacks with a swordstorm, with a 35% chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

skills.name: Divine Response
skills.description: Corrects stance, increasing Combat Readiness of all allies by 15% and increasing their Speed for 2 turns.

specialtySkill.name: Food Master
specialtySkill.description: Not very popular, but a great cook. A self-taught chef from his days leading a group of nomads.

summonQuote: Though I may be lacking, I will do my best!
description: A kind warrior of the Itan Clan who takes care of the sandcats

name: Sven
background: The leader of Wetheric Moor's new Strongman Company, Sven is straightforward and outgoing, with a goal to keep getting stronger. A hot-blooded young man who is likely training even now.

skills.name: Wicked Strike
skills.description: Attacks with dual-wielded swords, and triggers an extra attack when the caster's Health is less than 50%. Extra attack deals damage proportional to the caster's lost Health, and can only be activated once per turn.

skills.name: Potential
skills.description:
Grants immortality and increased Attack for 1 turn when the caster receives lethal damage.
Can only be activated once every 8 turn(s).

skills.name: Capital Punishment
skills.description: Attacks all enemies, dealing huge damage proportional to the enemy's lost Health.

specialtySkill.name: Survival Expert
specialtySkill.description: Survival requires practice. Lots of practice.

summonQuote: Look forward to what I have to offer!
description: A native of Wetheric Moor, and leader of a new mercenary company

name: Taranor Guard
background: A member of the Taranor Guard. Unafraid of death, they will obey any order.

skills.name: Spear Art
skills.description: Knocks the enemy into the air with a spear, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 1 turn.

skills.name: Discipline
skills.description: Increases chance of Dual Attack by 5%. Combat Readiness of all allies increases by 25% and the caster is granted increased Attack for 1 turn when a Dual Attack is triggered.

skills.soulBurnEffect: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
skills.name: Pierce
skills.description: Pierces the enemy's weak point with a spear, absorbing Combat Readiness by 40%.

specialtySkill.name: Experienced Soldier
specialtySkill.description: They've honed their skills by confronting countless enemies.

summonQuote: Salute! I vow to follow your every order!
description: A brave guard protecting Taranor

name: Taranor Royal Guard
background: Soldiers responsible for guarding the King and Taranor Royal Palace, even as the energy of rebellion flows throughout Taranor, they remain faithfully loyal.

skills.name: Sword of the Kingdom
skills.description: Attacks with a sword, with a 35% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Shield Deflect
skills.description: The target rebounds 30% of the damage suffered from a critical hit, proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Strike
skills.description: Jumps towards the enemy and attacks them, dispelling all buffs and absorbing all damage as Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Veteran Soldier
specialtySkill.description: As a soldier of the palace, they take pride in keeping order.

summonQuote: Leave everything to me.
description: For Taranor! A soldier following any royal command

name: Tieria
background: An adventurous woman, Tieria always chooses to travel in dangerous locations to satisfy her love for thrills. Her personality is calm and carefree, and she prefers to travel alone instead of dealing with other people. However, her beauty ensures she always attracts plenty of attention.

skills.name: Demon Cutter
skills.description: Attacks with an axe, with a 50% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

skills.name: Dance of Sands
skills.description: Increases the Combat Readiness of allies by 10%.

skills.name: Soul Break
skills.description: Strikes the enemy strongly, dealing damage proportional to the target's max Health.

specialtySkill.name: Hobby
specialtySkill.description: She seeks adventure, but treads lightly.

summonQuote: I look forward to working with you.
description: An adventurer of strange new lands who loves solitude

name: Wanda
background: A girl from Reingar, Wanda is a curious young woman who gets bored of things very easily. Former student, nun, and mercenary, she is currently working as a self-styled treasure hunter... for now.

skills.name: Weak Point
skills.description: Shoots an arrow at the enemy. When the enemy is targeted, damage dealt is increased and their Combat Readiness is decreased by 10%

damageModifiers.name: target_debuff_rate
damageModifiers.description: Increased damage if enemy is targetted. Max once.

skills.name: Steady Aim
skills.description: Has a 80% chance to target a random enemy for 2 turns at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Fatal Shot
skills.description: Attacks the enemy's vital points, with a 80% chance to stun for 1 turn.

specialtySkill.name: Fine Idea
specialtySkill.description: Not enough time? Work faster.

summonQuote: I'll quit as soon as it gets boring, but until then, let's have fun together.
description: A temperamental young woman who hates to be bored

name: Mega-Phantasma
background: A magical creature that has collected great power over the course of its long life. It is incredibly wary, and unable to properly control its own power, making it capable of delivering great damage.

skills.name: Gnaw
skills.description: Attacks with sharp teeth.

skills.name: Phantasma Seeds
skills.description: The item will be at max level when you receive it, and earn a bonus 3% EXP in battle.

description: Power compressed into a shadow of glory
